Bringing pride to your home.
Chez vous avec fiert√©e. Service bilingue. 
One on one for all your electrical projects. 
Un a un pour tout vos projets electrique.

I am a the owner of C. Leclair Electric, Registered Electrical Contractor. I have 24 years of Electrical Contracting experience and 33 years as an electrician. I service the whole Ottawa region from Cumberland to Stittsville to Ottawa South. 

I mainly do residential electrical renovations, additions and service calls. 
Give me a call or email me if you have any electrical work to do and I will be more than happy to discuss with you about your projects or even just a service call. 

Fully insured. 

Master Electrician Licence #6011497 
ECRA/ESA #7008809 

Thank you, 
Merci, 

613 223-4912 

Owner 
Charles Leclair 
C. Leclair Electric
services:
